snippet.title: The InBetween - Official Trailer | Game Devs of Color Expo 2024
snippet.description: Forge your fate in The InBetween, a 2d hand-drawn/pixel art metroidvania where you have to use your ever-increasing skills in combat and platforming along with your conscience to save an infected underground world or End it. Check out the trailer for The InBetween to see combat and more. The InBetween will be available on PC, and a demo is out now on Steam.
